name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: hadoop.security.group.mapping.ldap.read.timeout.ms
description:
This property is the read timeout (in milliseconds) for LDAP
    operations. If the LDAP provider doesn't get a LDAP response within the
    specified period, it will abort the read attempt. Non-positive value
    means no read timeout is specified in which case it waits for the response
    infinitely.

name: dfs.namenode.top.num.users
description: Number of top users returned by the top tool

name: dfs.namenode.retrycache.expirytime.millis
description: The time for which retry cache entries are retained.

name: io.seqfile.compress.blocksize
description:
The minimum block size for compression in block compressed
          SequenceFiles.

name: dfs.client.block.write.locateFollowingBlock.retries
description: Number of retries to use when finding the next block during HDFS writes.

name: fs.s3a.socket.recv.buffer
description: Socket receive buffer hint to amazon connector. Represented in bytes.
